name: Easy Wi-Fi
short_description:
♦ NO VIRUSES, NO SPYWARE, NO ADWARE — NO MALWARE! SCANNED BY 48 ANTI-MALWARE ENGINES AT www.virustotal.com

♦ DON'T FORGET TO LIKE ON FACEBOOK TO STAY CONNECTED WITH UPDATES, NEWS & NEW APPS: www.facebook.com/AminulOfficial

NOTICE:
♦ A new build of Easy Wi-Fi 1.0.0 with bug fixed is available now. So, it's recommended to download this new build and remove the previous one downloaded before 30-Oct-13.
♦ To get Portable version go to "Browse All Files".
♦ The new version "Easy Wi-Fi 2.0.0" will be available soon.

ABOUT:
Easy Wi-Fi is a simple but powerful tool to make your Windows 8 PC into a Wi-Fi Hotspot easily and quickly. It can also connect your PC with different devices that have WLAN. It's also compatible with Windows 7/Vista.

VERSION: 
1.0.0 

REQUIREMENT:
WLAN with updated driver.

DEVELOPER:
Syed Aminul Islam
Website: www.aminulofficial.tk
(or try the alternative URL: https://sites.google.com/site/aminulofficial)
summary: Easy Wi-Fi makes your Win 8 PC into a Wi-Fi Hotspot easily and quickly
